Articles.Content: Every time I restart this game, the UI goes back to the 120% size it was set to initially before I got resolution set up. The problem is, it keeps the size slider in the same spot. I'm at 80% ui scale and the ui is so big it's taking up almost my whole screen. Is there any way to fix this?
